messages.message:
@Serena are these changes reverted already?
I am having problems with editing files on aihub.uat sandbox

no, these changes were not reverted

how are you editing files? which URL are you using?

I am trying to edit a `py` file (https://aihub.uat.instabase.com/apps/text-editor/rafal.powalski/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/aihub/2d9ae259-a7cd-4b9e-99ca-57832a690faa/flows/1693213665278/modules/Passport.refiner/scripts/run_model.py?) in the text editor
When I click save I get “Error saving file” message

can you open the browser console -> click on the network tab -> try to save again -> check for any API calls that return an error?

i just tried and was able to save changes to a file in the text editor

i checked `api-server` logs (https://aihub.uat.instabase.com/deployment-manager/logs?service=api-server&container=api-server&text_filter=passport.refiner&start_time=1693156385478000000&end_time=1693242785478000000) for API calls involving this file, and i see that a 400 was returned for a `PUT /api/v2/files/rafal.powalski/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/aihub/2d9ae259-a7cd-4b9e-99ca-57832a690faa/flows/1693213665278/modules/Passport.refiner/scripts/run_model.py` request

i’m not sure why the server returned 400 though, so i’m hoping there was an error message returned with the 400 status code
